## TileLoader.loadAndDecode() method

Start loading and/or proceed through the various states of loading of this tile.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadAndDecode(): Promise<TileLoaderState>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise which resolves the \[\[TileLoaderState\]\].
